statements: ALTER TABLE FitnessData ADD COLUMN workout_date DATE
ALTER TABLE FitnessData MODIFY COLUMN workout_duration FLOAT
ALTER TABLE FitnessData DROP COLUMN calories_burned
ALTER TABLE FitnessUser ADD COLUMN email VARCHAR(100)
ALTER TABLE FitnessUser MODIFY COLUMN username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE
ALTER TABLE FitnessActivity ADD COLUMN location VARCHAR(100)
ALTER TABLE workout_plan ADD COLUMN equipment_needed VARCHAR(100);
ALTER TABLE exercise MODIFY COLUMN difficulty_level ENUM('Easy', 'Moderate', 'Difficult');
ALTER TABLE user_statistics DROP COLUMN workout_days;
ALTER TABLE users ADD COLUMN last_name VARCHAR(50)
ALTER TABLE workouts ALTER COLUMN duration TYPE INTERVAL(2)
ALTER TABLE exercises DROP COLUMN muscle_group
ALTER TABLE users ADD COLUMN phone_number VARCHAR(15);
ALTER TABLE activities ADD COLUMN category VARCHAR(50);
ALTER TABLE goals ADD COLUMN progress_description TEXT;
